message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $8,000 for it. Would you consider reducing the price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I need to get closer to my asking price.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your position, I still believe that $8,000 would be a fair price for the product. Could we possibly agree on this amount?
